subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: The Kansas City Royals took a two-games-to-one lead in the World Series over the Giants by sticking to their winning formula of quality starting pitching, sound defense and a dominant bullpen.
snippet: The Kansas City Royals took a two-games-to-one lead in the World Series over the Giants by sticking to their winning formula of quality starting pitching, sound defense and a dominant bullpen.
